title: "Unknown error"
body: Hey friends, as you can see I'm getting this "Unknown error". I've tried playing on different accounts but I get the same message. Help is requested! Thanks again friends.

replies.body: There were some server issues last night connecting to chat.  Everything should be okay now per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  let me know if you still have any issues!
I'm getting the exact same issue. I've also tried multiple accounts.
